item.title: Emma add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
Emma add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
Emma add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
item.description: "Can't you just like a girl who likes you back?' 'None of them likes me back. I may as well like the one I really want." -- Rainbow Rowell
